reason.tex: \text{There is a nice rule of thumb - called ILATE} \\ \text{to help you decide what f(x) and g(x) should be.}\\ \text{Basically, f(x) is the function that matches first.}\\ \begin{tabular}{c|c|c} I & Inverse Trig & - \\ \hline L & Logarithm & - \\ \hline A & Algebra & x = f(x) \\ \hline T & Trignometric & \sec^2 x = g(x) \\ \hline E & Exponential & - \\ \hline \end{tabular}
